    • findWithLoop

      public int findWithLoop​(char[] find)
      This method finds with using loop the given char array in the text. It returns the start index of the first occurrence of the searched group of characters, otherwise returns -1.
      Parameters:
      find - is the char array to be find
      Returns:
      index is the start index of the char array

    • findWithIterator

      public int findWithIterator​(char[] find)
      This method finds with using iterator the given char array in the text. It returns the start index of the first occurrence of the searched group of characters, otherwise returns -1.
      Parameters:
      find - is the char array to be find
      Returns:
      index is the start index of the char array
